channel.title: FLF - God, Law, and Liberty
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Law of Nature Jeremy Bentham and I Overlooked [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Common law authority William Blackstone said that man “must in all points conform to the will of his nature,” and this will was called the “natural law.” Today, David explains how he overlooked the most fundamental law of human nature because he read the Bible like a disciple of legal positivist Jeremy Bentham. From his experience, David offers a proposition about the state of evangelicalism in America.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Pursuit of Righteous Laws and the Presidential Election [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Evangelicals of all stripes want to live in a country that has righteous laws or, we might say, law in accord with God’s law. And to that end the debate rages among those voting for Trump because they are evangelicals and those not voting for Harris because they are evangelical. The recent comments of David French and the formation of “Evangelicals for Harris” and the evangelical rejoinder to them quickly come to mind. Today, David launches a short series that talks about the evangel of righteousness that seems to have been lost in the din of politics.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC
